welcome_message: Welcome to Sky eSims - Your Ultimate Solution for Hassle-free Mobile Connectivity Across the World!
hero_title: Stay connected effortlessly while exploring the
hero_subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied travelers who have stayed connected during their adventures around the world.
welcome_description: As you plan your next adventure, staying connected is more important than ever. Whether you're exploring the vibrant streets of Kingston, lounging on the pristine beaches of Barbados, or hiking through the lush rainforests of Dominica, you want to share your experiences with friends and family back home. That's where Sky comes in.
download_app_subtitle: Discover exclusive deals and discounts with our mobile experience.
experience_description: Sky is your ultimate solution for hassle-free mobile connectivity across the world. We understand that navigating a new destination can be overwhelming, especially when it comes to communication.
newsletter_subtitle: Subscribe to our newsletter for daily/weekly update of our products and services.
footer_description: Sky is your trusted partner for seamless global connectivity. We provide reliable eSIM solutions for travelers worldwide, ensuring you stay connected wherever your adventures take you.

onboarding1_description: Provide us with the necessary required information and let us do all the data you need!!!
onboarding2_title: Activate Your eSIM, Connect and Enjoy!
onboarding2_description: Once activated, your device will automatically connect to our network. You can manage your eSIM settings anytime through the app.
onboarding3_description: Ensure your device supports eSIM. Most recent models from brands like Apple, Google, and Samsung are compatible. If you're unsure, consult your device's user manual or visit the manufacturer's website.
about_subtitle: Your trusted partner for seamless connectivity across the world
mission_description: At Sky, we are dedicated to providing travelers with seamless, reliable, and affordable mobile connectivity throughout the world. We understand that staying connected is essential for modern travelers, whether for navigation, sharing experiences, or staying in touch with loved ones.
reliable_connectivity_desc: We ensure consistent and high-quality network coverage across all major destinations.
customer_first_desc: Your satisfaction is our priority. We provide 24/7 support to ensure a smooth experience.
innovation_desc: We continuously improve our services and technology to provide the best possible experience.
contact_subtitle: Get in touch with our team for any questions or support
